original: intros pl n H1 H2. induction pl. - inversion H2. - assert (H3: pl_tl_length pl n). { apply (H1 (pl_path_cons a pl) (pl_path_incl_cons pl a l ls) (pl_path_incl_length (pl_path_cons a pl) (prec_cons a l ls) n) H2). } apply pl_tl_S. apply IHpl. intros p Hincl. apply (H1 (pl_path_cons a p) (pl_path_incl_next p a l ls Hincl (neq_sym (pl_path_nnil a p)))). apply H3.
